alert.note: Alert for Eastern Chittenden; Lamoille (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 5:50PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Lamoille and east central Chittenden Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 550 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cambridge, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jeffersonville Village, Underhill State Park, Cambridge, Stowe, Cambridge Village, Underhill, Morristown, Johnson, Jeffersonville, Pleasant Valley, Smugglers Notch, Cambridge Junction, and South Cambridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
